task.title: How to Schedule a House Tour
task.shortdesc: To view any rental property or property for sale, follow these steps

context.p: If you are interested in viewing any property that we currently own, please let us know. All of our current properties are listed under the Current Properties tab on our website

step.cmd: Determine your current monthly housing budget
Determine if you are looking to buy or rent a house. If you are unsure, we can help
Browse our current properties to see if any catch your eye
Contact us to schedule an appointment
Meet us at a time that works for you to view the property
